tool.name: Movie Maker Basic
tool.description: produces a basic pymol session for the creation of a protein ligand interaction movie with PyMol

param.name: residue_number
param.label: Insert residue number of amino acid

validator.message: Wrong format! Please enter just integers.

tool.help:
This tool creates a PyMol session, which can be used to produce a movie with PyMol. # Input Parameter Following parameters should be entered to allow a flawless computation:
pdb-file residue number three letter code of amino acid chain of the binding pocket in question
Example: 4s0v.pdb 145 LEU A
#Output The pymol session (*.pse) can be downloaded as pse file and loaded with pymol.
